text: Acoustic Live Radio Show is a live EP by Thirty Seconds to Mars recorded on September 17, 2002, along with 30 Seconds to Mars.http://www.nme.com/artists/30-seconds-to-mars/album/acoustic-live-radio- show/24 ==History== The EP contains acoustic versions of "Capricorn (A Brand New Name)", "Buddha For Mary", "Oblivion", "The Mission" and "Echelon".http://www.last.fm/music/30+Seconds+to+Mars/Acoustic+Live+Radio+Show ==Track listing== ==References== ==Other websites== * 30 Seconds to Mars' official website * "A Beautiful Lie" Official Page Category:2002 albums Category:Thirty Seconds to Mars albums
title: Acoustic Live Radio Show
